markdownRemark.html:
Mailing Lists

Currently, 11 GSA listservs are operating under DSVA.

Transition

We will be transitioning from GSA listserv to USDS mailing lists in September 2017. If you have a profile with a government email (.gov) you will automatically be added to both the USDS-wide (usds@lists.usds.gov) and the DSVA-wide (va@lists.usds.gov) mailing lists. However, non-government emails will need to be added manually by Marc Harbatkin.

GSA (listserv.gsa.gov) USDS (lists.usds.gov) Description Administrator
usds@ USDS-wide
usds-va@ va@ USDS-wide for vets DSVA team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-dsva@ DSVA-wide for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-usds@ USDS-wide notices for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-eng@ Engineering COP for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-des Design COP for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-devops Devops COP for vets.gov team James Kassemi
vetsgov-vetsgov-devops-maintenance Devops COP for vets.gov team James Kassemi
vetsgov-pjm Project managers for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-pdm Product managers for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-leads Team leads for vets.gov team Marc Harbatkin
vetsgov-adhoc Adhoc-wide for vets.gov team James Kassemi

Mailing Lists Management

  • To be added to a mailing list when onboarding, please e-mail Marc Harbatkin, contact your team lead, or list administrator (see above) and provide your name and e-mail adress (.gov preferred).
  • To be removed from a listserv (when offboarding) please e-mail Marc Harbatkin](marc.harbatkin@va.gov), contact your team lead, or list administrator (see above).
